short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Become more productive by blocking out distracting websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension is a website blocker that allows you to enhance your productivity by restricting access to distracting websites. Simply enter the URLs you want to block in the input field, and the extension will prevent you from visiting those sites while you work. Customize your browsing experience by curating a list of sites you want to avoid, and stay focused on your tasks without interruptions.
